very nice game for people who enjpooy horror games and also very good game if you want to trash talk campers

really exciting game, if you love horror games, or survival games, you will love this game, this game is played better with friends since dead by daylight is a game that requires communication, heads up: when you start the game for the first time the music is VERY loud. so far i havent met any toxic players or any bad experiences yet ;). compare the dead by daylight comunity to the rocket leauge or fortnite comunity, it dosent even come close, great game and a bang for the buck, i would recomend this game for anyone who is in need of an exciting game.
Either they cant play or theyre fucking OP there is no in between where you can just enjoy.
Just scary enough to make my nerves crawl but also has some satisfaction by leveling up the characters and killers. Some of the killers just let me and my friends live too if we danced with them.

Closing in on 1,000 hours, primarily playing survivor mode, I can say this is by far the best game to die in.
esta chistoso, le conte a un amigo de la existencia del payaso y desde entonces que no abre el juego

I am happier ever since I stopped playing.

New updates break more stuff than they fix.
It takes months for devs to acknowledge issues and they may or may not work on them. Why? Because they dont give a fuck since DBD doesn't have any competition.
Also, the matchmaking is non existent. Rank 12's killers getting matched with Rank 5's survivors, and so on. Basically, someone with ~50 hours getting matched against 4 people with 300-800 hours. Fun!

Won't recommend in its current state.
Been playing for almost five months and I just can't get enough.. Constantly updated & there's always new content. Keeps things fresh!

Ex console player with thousands of hours. Great game if you take the time to learn how it works. Seemingly endless combinations of perks and abilities always leaves you wondering what the other team might have. Community is generally not toxic and would recommend investing in it for the full experience
